Equipment Actions.Action 1: Mace, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 2: Healing Touch, The Deva can touch another creature and magically heal them, as well as cure them of any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness
Other Actions.Action 3: Change Shape, The Deva can magically polymorph into a humanoid or beast, or back into its true form

Abilities.Ability 1: Angelic Weapons, The Deva's weapon attacks are magical and deal extra Average 18 Radiant damage
Abilities.Ability 2: Innate Spellcasting, The Deva can innately cast a few spells while requiring only verbal components
Abilities.Ability 3: Magic Resistance, The Deva has advantage on saving throws againts spells and other magical effects

Damage Resistances.Damage 2: Bludgeoning, Piercing and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
